00007 #include "MotorSafetyHelper.h"
00008 #include "Timer.h"
00009 #include "stdio.h"

00020 MotorSafetyHelper::MotorSafetyHelper(MotorSafety *safeObject)
00021 {
00022     m_safeObject = safeObject;
00023     m_enabled = false;
00024     m_expiration = DEFAULT_SAFETY_EXPIRATION;
00025     m_stopTime = Timer::GetFPGATimestamp();
00026     m_nextHelper = m_headHelper;
00027     m_headHelper = this;
00028 }
00029 
00030 MotorSafetyHelper *MotorSafetyHelper::m_headHelper = 0;
00031 
00032 /*
00033  * Feed the motor safety object.
00034  * Resets the timer on this object that is used to do the timeouts.
00035  */
00036 void MotorSafetyHelper::Feed()
00037 {
00038     m_stopTime = Timer::GetFPGATimestamp() + m_expiration;
00039 }
00040 
00041 /*
00042  * Set the expiration time for the corresponding motor safety object.
00043  * @param expirationTime The timeout value in seconds.
00044  */
00045 void MotorSafetyHelper::SetExpiration(float expirationTime)
00046 {
00047     m_expiration = expirationTime;
00048 }
00049 
00054 float MotorSafetyHelper::GetExpiration()
00055 {
00056     return m_expiration;
00057 }
00058 
00063 bool MotorSafetyHelper::IsAlive()
00064 {
00065     return !m_enabled || m_stopTime > Timer::GetFPGATimestamp();
00066 }
00067 
00074 void MotorSafetyHelper::Check()
00075 {
00076     if (!m_enabled) return;
00077     if (m_stopTime < Timer::GetFPGATimestamp())
00078     {
00079         // TODO: Produce an error for the driver station in the case of a timeout.
00080         m_safeObject->StopMotor();
00081     }
00082 }
00083 
00089 void MotorSafetyHelper::SetSafetyEnabled(bool enabled)
00090 {
00091     m_enabled = enabled;
00092 }
00093 
00099 bool MotorSafetyHelper::IsSafetyEnabled()
00100 {
00101     return m_enabled;
00102 }
00103 
00109 //TODO: these should be synchronized with the setting methods in case it's called from a different thread
00110 void MotorSafetyHelper::CheckMotors()
00111 {
00112     for (MotorSafetyHelper *msh = m_headHelper; msh != NULL; msh = msh->m_nextHelper)
00113     {
00114         msh->Check();
00115     }
00116 }
